pages.title: Card Fusion Table
pages.text: $(bred)Card Fusion Table$() is a table that can use power of $(byellow)sun$() and $(bgreen)essence$() to fusion card, by using it players can get new cards. Like, PeaShooter Card and PeaShooter Card have chance to fusion to Repeater Card.

but it's not always successful, each fusion have a $(bred)very low chance to fail that result are one of old cards$(). What's more, the same recipe may have multy results, such as puffshroom and seashroom are both got from fumeshroom and scaredyshroom.
Each fusion need $(byellow)2000 Sun$() on the left sun slot, And $(bgreen)3 Random Essence$() on the right 3 essence slots.
